DOC.brief_summary: This study is to evaluate the magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) and clinical results of arthroscopic repair of subscapularis tears
DOC.brief_title: Repair of Subscapularis Tear :Clinical Results and MRI Analysis
DOC.detailed_description: ROM UCLA Constant ASES VAS MRI Goutallier
DOC.criteria: Patients suffering from rotator cuff injury scheduled for an arthroscopic procedure. A partial or fullthickness subscapularis tendon tear revision repairs or open repairs.
